plot: When clown Bassie and acrobat Adriaan oversleep, their circus is gone and can't find it. To make some money they have to find another job. But an evil teaser (De Plaaggeest) is following them.
title: Bassie en Adriaan en de plaaggeest
plot_es: When clown Bassie and acrobat Adriaan oversleep, their circus is gone and can't find it. To make some money they have to find another job. But an evil teaser (De Plaaggeest) is following them.
original_name: Bassie en Adriaan en de plaaggeest
plot_en: When clown Bassie and acrobat Adriaan oversleep, their circus is gone and can't find it. To make some money they have to find another job. But an evil teaser (De Plaaggeest) is following them.
